divs: Sighting DetailsMY ADULT SON AND HUSBAND WERE FISHING AT A WEST VA LAKE. THEY LOOKED UP TO SEE A GLOBE OR ORB, COMING ACROSS THE SKY. IT LOOKED LIKE AN AIRPLANE WOULD LOOK. I MEAN, IN ALTITUDE. THERE WERE NO OTHER LIGHTS ON IT. JUST ONE BRIGHT LIGHT. AS IT WENT BY, MY HUSBAND WENT BACK TO FISHING. BUT, MY SON KEPT WATCHING IT. AFTER IT PASSED BY, IT WAS BRIGHTER. SO, I DON'T KNOW IF IT BRIGHTEN UP AFTER IT PASSED OR WHETHER THE BACK END WAS BRIGHTER. NO SOUND!
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Elkview
There were no other sightings in Elkview on or around July 31st 2008
